instructions: Open the Settings app on your iPhone and tap Notifications. Tap the Research app and adjust your notifications.

In the iTunes Store, tap More, then tap Purchased. If you set up Family Sharing, choose a family member to view their purchases. Note: You can see purchases made by family members only if they choose to share their purchases. Tap Music, Movies, or TV Shows. Find the item you want to download, then tap the Download button .
